content: रहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [रह्-कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Quitted, left, abandoned, deserted. {@--2@} Separated from, free from, deprived or destitute of, without (with <ab>instr.</ab> or at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); रहिते भिक्षुभिर्ग्रामे <ls>Y. 3. 59</ls>; गुणरहितः; सत्त्वरहितः &c. {@--3@} Lonely, solitary. --तं Secrecy, privacy.
